Message.Title: MSFT or AAPL would look stupid to now buy YHOO for what would have to be over $30 or even $35 now when they....
Message.Msg: ...could have easily picked it up for $25 or less (for over two years!) and still gotten 43% of AG. Ballmer is a fool, much like Dr ("AG only worth 1 bil.") Gloom, Grey and hotmodel ("sell YHOO at $14") are on this board. But they have lost actual money on YHOO while Ballmer just lost opportunity for MSFT.

Topic.Title: MSFT or AAPL would look stupid to now buy YHOO for what would have to be over $30 or even $35 now when they....

Message.Msg: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Where did I say "sell YHOO at $14"? I know you're an idiot and all but I WROTE options making me a synthetic long with the LOWEST PRICE OF THE YEAR!!! Then I took that money UP FRONT and shoved half of it into Netflix. How has Netflix did...$65 to $217, making me contemplate retiring completely. Aren't you the idiot who called for $22? Used another ID calling for $20? Even though if you just bought the calls as it rose you'd have made money? All of my trades in Yahoo have made money including my short from $22.90 to $22 was perfect, 35% return. My long position from $22's to $24.68 is up a few bucks. For a guy who dumped in the $19's, months ago, why are you even here? That includes your other ID's Shashag,Texassucksbig, KLMDSI, Bushworstprezever, and Mewag. NO ONE IS BUYING YAHOO!!! Apple is giving $100B to SHAREHOLDERS, MSFT grew FASTER than Yahoo by far, last quarter. AG isn't available to an acquirer as a thing called "right to first refusal" comes into play. The core is still in the toilet and considering Yahoo has bought 200M shares its the equivalent of $20, in 09'...nothing to write home about. Want my autograph??? You have to otherwise to make a topic to WHINE is weird.

Topic.Title: YHOO front page worse than the ENQUIRE rag !!!!!!

Message.Msg: Only real standard of good taste is NY Post (or Sun, if you're Brit)

Considering the high growth expected from the US Internet industry, we can value Yahoo with a p/e of 25, which gives us a target price of $30. Therefore Yahoo! has an upside of 30% at current valuations making the stock a strong buy. Facebook and Google are still the best bet in the Internet advertisement industry but for investors looking for a high-risk, high-return play, Yahoo! is the way to go.

With MM is at the helm of YHOO, the core business will finally get into sustainable growth and I strongly believe that. I am confident she will be successful. With a PE of 7 now, say going to PE 15, watch $30 to $40 per YHOO share, the Asian assets are the icing of the cake.

Yeah! And what a Spam sandwich??? Fried extra crispy. Spam is the use of electronic messaging systems to send unsolicited bulk messages, especially advertising, indiscriminately. While the most widely recognized form of spam is e-mail spam, the term is applied to similar abuses in other media. And if You add PORK to this , You get real SPAM. UMMMMM GOOD!!
I bought 100 shares on July 24, 2012 and 50 shares more in September 2012.
Yang would like to see anything over $33.. Ballmer will regret not buying Yahoo when they were trading at $11.

Dickey, YHOO is up based on real improvements in the company. May stocks are up on froth and hype. That might be the reason and as for the diddly squat return, only a drunk or a fool would talk such nonsense so I'm glad that G protects both so you will be covered.

Message.Title: yahoo japan hedge
Message.Msg: The YJ hedge was put on 1jan13 and for nine months looking forward. I would think yhoo expects to no longer own a postion in YJ at least by sept. I expect a announcement soon of yhoo selling thier stake in YJ.

Message.Title: Yhoo being acquired
Message.Msg: From what I can tell, The selling of half the Alibaba stake last year puts no restrictions on the remaining half as for as someone buying yhoo outright. I cannot find anywhere the first right of purchase.
Dickey poo you are too much. Why don't you stop being a dunce?
